'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [landmass](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireWorldMap/) in {{poe2}}.

## Background

A large, desert island housing the remnants of a splinter [Engwith](/engwith/)an civilization. The [Poko Kohara ruins](/pokoKoharaRuins/) have remained open for exploration for a long while, but the devastating storms and local wildlife have made exploration difficult. At least one expedition from [VTC](/vtc/) was lost recently, trying to ascertain the potential for mining luminous adra at the Island.

## Locations

* [x50px](/fileIconPokoKoharaRuinsPng/) '''[Poko Kohara ruins](/pokoKoharaRuins/)''': An old Engwithan ruin, and the central location on the island.<br clear="left" />

###### Points of interest

* [x50px](/fileIconHuanaShrinePng/) '''[K훮bara Reku Shrine](/kabaraRekuShrine/)''': A small shrine dedicated to [Rikuhu](/berath/). You can identify its dedication with [Religion](/religion/) and determine that the area is safe to rest  with [Survival](/survival/) (giving you a free rest). A Monk, Cipher, or Druid can ... . You can also rest, pray at the shrine and rest, or do the unspeakable and desecrate it.<br clear="left" />
* [x50px](/fileIconShipwreckPng/) '''Shipwreck''': In the ocean to the east of the landing point.<br clear="left" />
* [x50px](/fileIconFlotsamPng/) '''Flotsam''': One to the northeast of the shipwreck, and another just south of it.<br clear="left" />

## Quests

* [The Storms of Poko Kohara](/theStormsOfPokoKohara/)
